-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/badges/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/comments/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/linktypes/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/postlinks/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/posttypes/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/users/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/votes/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/sharedknow/votetypes/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;


-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_comments4(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate DATETIME,
    PostId nvarchar(50),
    Score nvarchar(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50)
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/comments/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_comments4;

--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.badget003(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    Name_value nvarchar(50),
    UserId nvarchar(50),
    Date_value DATETIME    
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/badges/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.badget003;

--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.linktypes(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    Type NVARCHAR(100)     
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/linktypes/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.linktypes;
--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.postlinks5(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate DATETIME,
    PostId nvarchar(10),
    RelatedPostId nvarchar(50),
    LinkTypeld  nvarchar(10)
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/postlinks/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.postlinks5;


--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.posttypes(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    Type nvarchar(50)   
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/posttypes/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.posttypes;

--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.users3(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate DATETIME,
    DownVotes int,
    LastAccessDate DATETIME,
    Reputation int,
    UpVotes int,
    Views int,
    Accountld INT,
    Email nvarchar(100)
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/users/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.users3;

--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.votes4(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    PostId nvarchar(50),
    UserId nvarchar(50),
    BountyAmount nvarchar(50),
    VoteTypeId_value int,
    CreationDate DATETIME    
  
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/votes/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.votes4;

--------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.votetypes3(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    Name_value nvarchar(100)
  
)
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/sharedknow/votetypes/*.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.votetypes3;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/*.parquet', --leer todos los parquet dentro del contenedor
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02 Crear la tabla junto con sus campos de acuerdo al tipo de variable

-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_clientes002( 
    CODMES nvarchar(6),
    Cod_Cliente nvarchar(10),
    Edad int,
    Departamento nvarchar(50),
    Nivel_Educ nvarchar(50),
    Antiguedad_Laboral int,
    Tiempo_Direccion_Actual int,
    Ingreso int,
    Ratio_Deuda_Ingreso decimal(4,2),
    Deuda_TC int,
    Deuda_Otros int,
    Ratio_Cuota_Ingreso decimal(4,2),
    Default_Value int
    )
WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_clientes002;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT * FROM master_party.dim_clientes002

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04 pasamos un select de toda mi tabla y pasamos a otra tabla para su visualizacion
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_clientes_dim
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_clientes_tf/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_clientes002;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_clientes_dim
-------------------------------------------------------------

WITH ShortCreationTable(shortdate) AS (
SELECT CONVERT(DATE, SUBSTRING(creation_date, 1,10)) AS shortdate
FROM master_transaction.t_interaction
), DistinctDateTable (distinctdate) AS (
SELECT DISTINCT shortdate as distinctdate
FROM ShortCreationTable
)

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distinctdate ASC) AS period_id, 
distinctdate as period,
YEAR(distinctdate) as year,
MONTH(distinctdate) as month
FROM DistinctDateTable;

/*---------------------------------------------
Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Mauro A. León Payano
Fecha: 12/12/2022*/
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 1: Creacion de repositorio de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse;
GO

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_party AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_channel AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignación de clave de encriptación y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k23sdpipi'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T09:39:32Z&st=2023-04-26T01:39:32Z&spr=https&sig=V2B7Vby5CiaJ6Fh%2FFiJAACclkboPC8PVHIHCAGIzy5g%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsjlcgdev9by.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO

Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Jose Luis Cacho Guerrero

-----------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------

GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

GO --llave que va a incriptar la información, se usa la llave para ejecutar 

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T09:57:40Z&st=2023-05-02T01:57:40Z&spr=https&sig=CyGVnV1z8YyhUECepaHETnjAp2tgStB7p4rn3%2FV6gzs%3D'
GO -- credencial para unirse con la cuenta de almacenamiento

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsjlcgdev9by.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO
